Pre-Game Insights: The Men in Green have suffered three consecutive losses, including an eight-wicket defeat to Afghanistan.
The Proteas have emerged as one of the most commanding teams in the tournament with a massive 149-run win over Bangladesh.
Pakistan has seemed like a shell of the team before the World Cup as Babar Azam and Co. have struggled to get going in the ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
South Africa has grown into a tournament favourite with a few dominant wins.
Proteas captain Temba Bavuma and fast bowler Lungi Ngidi missed the previous game against Bangladesh due to injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai has produced balanced wickets with an average score of 245.
The batters can score runs and capitalise throughout the day.
At the same time, fast bowlers can generate some movement and bounce with the new ball, while spinners generally wickets as the ball starts gripping.
